Index.title: Jot Diary
Index.deleteDescription: This entry will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
Index.sttNotSupported: Your browser does not support speech recognition. Chrome is recommended for Android, and Safari for iOS. WeChat browser is not supported.
Index.sttNoSpeech: No speech detected, please try again
Index.sttNetwork: Network error, please check your connection
Index.sttNotAllowed: Microphone access denied, please allow access in browser settings

Auth.signinDescription: Sign in to access your diary
Auth.signupDescription: Create a new account to start recording
Auth.resetDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link
Auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
Auth.hasAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
Auth.signinError: Sign in failed, please check your email and password
Auth.emailNotConfirmed: Email not confirmed. Please check your email and click the verification link. If you didn't receive the email, please check your spam folder.
Auth.signupError: Sign up failed, please check your email format and password strength
Auth.resetError: Failed to send password reset email
Auth.signupSuccess: Sign up successful! Please sign in with your email and password.
Auth.resetSuccess: Password reset email sent, please check your inbox
Auth.operationError: Operation failed, please try again later
Auth.googleSignInError: Google sign in failed, please try again later

Welcome.title: Welcome to Jot Diary
Welcome.description: Please sign in to start recording your life

Pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
Pricing.description: Unlock more features and enhance your diary experience
Pricing.faq1A: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.
Pricing.faq2Q: What payment methods do you accept?
Pricing.faq2A: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other secure payment methods.
Pricing.faq3A: Yes, all paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.
Pricing.faq4Q: What happens to my data if I cancel?
Pricing.faq4A: Your data will remain accessible for 30 days after cancellation. You can export all your data at any time.
